net.calm.giani.exec

Class PipelineBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.calm.giani.exec.PipelineBuilder

  • public class PipelineBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Main entry point for building a GIANI pipeline. To build your own custom pipeline, extend this class and override the buildFullPipeline method
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Dave Barry
